		query (line 84)
	
 
	
	

Make a query to the SPARQL endpoint


SELECT and ASK queries will return an object of type  EasyRdf_Sparql_Result.
CONSTRUCT and DESCRIBE queries will return an object  of type EasyRdf_Graph.
